title: Friends in game 2hours +
body: Whenever I look at my friends who are in game, it says they are 120+ min into a game. I worked out that its actually (variable X) X minutes + 120minutes. eg, they are 20min into game, it will show 140min. I have had to install league 3 times in past week due to computer problems, but surely there is a fix wihtout reinstalling a fourth time?

replies.body:
mine works. 104 means 1 min 4 sec....

the 120 is probs 1:20
Nah it works out to be 2 hours, or 120 minutes. And I can do the math, its just kinda annoying not being able to just 'see'
